bibl.title: The Myth of Kephalos as an Aition of Rain-magic (Pherekydes FGrHist 3 F 34).
bibl.note: Revised version of a lecture delivered at the University of Waterloo, Mc. Master University, the Classical Association of Canada's annual meeting in Charlottetown, and the Humboldt-Universit√§t, Berlin. - PHEREKYDES, fr. 34 is preserved by the Mythographus Homericus; P.S.I. X, 1173 (= Pack2 1209), fr. 2, 29-51 has provided a parallel text to the version preserved in the Homeric scholia. Textual notes and reappraisal of the story.
FOWLER Robert L., The Myth of Kephalos as an Aition of Rain-magic (Pherekydes FGrHist 3 F 34).
364 Homeri Commentatores Mythographi Mythographus Homericus Pherecydes Atheniensis
